document_text:
RESUME

Riya Nair
Software Engineer | Full Stack Developer
riya.nair@gmail.com | (408) 555-2231
San Jose, CA 95110
linkedin.com/in/riyanair | github.com/riyanair

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Results-driven full-stack engineer with 4 years of experience building scalable web applications.
Proficient in React, Node.js, Python, and AWS. Passionate about clean code and agile collaboration.

EDUCATION
B.Tech in Computer Science — VIT University, Vellore, India
Graduated: May 2020 | GPA: 8.7/10

WORK EXPERIENCE
Software Engineer II — Zoho Corporation, Chennai, India (Jun 2020 – Aug 2022)
  - Built REST APIs serving 500K+ daily requests using Node.js and PostgreSQL
  - Reduced page load time by 38% via frontend optimizations (React, Webpack)
  - Led migration of legacy PHP modules to microservices architecture

Software Engineer — ServiceNow, San Jose, CA (Sep 2022 – Present)
  - Developed UI components for the Now Platform using React & TypeScript
  - Collaborated with ML team to integrate NLP features into workflow automation
  - Mentored 2 junior engineers; conducted weekly code reviews

SKILLS
Languages: Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, SQL
Frameworks: React, Node.js, Express, Django, Spring Boot
Cloud & DevOps: AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda), Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD (GitHub Actions)
Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis

CERTIFICATIONS
AWS Certified Developer – Associate (2023)
Google Professional Cloud Developer (2024)

LANGUAGES
English (Fluent), Tamil (Native), Hindi (Conversational)

document_text:
JOB OFFER LETTER

March 5, 2025

Dear Marcus Thompson,

We are delighted to extend this formal offer of employment at NovaTech AI Inc.

Position: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
Department: AI Platform Engineering
Reports To: Director of AI, Dr. Sarah Kim
Start Date: April 1, 2025
Work Location: Remote (US-based)

COMPENSATION
Base Salary: $175,000 per year
Annual Bonus: Up to 20% of base salary (performance-based)
Equity: 0.15% RSU vesting over 4 years (1-year cliff)
Signing Bonus: $15,000 (repayable if exit within 12 months)

BENEFITS
- Medical, Dental, Vision (100% premium covered for employee)
- 401(k) with 5% employer match
- 30 days PTO + 10 federal holidays
- $3,000 annual learning & development budget
- Home office stipend: $2,000 one-time setup

EMPLOYMENT CONDITIONS
This offer is contingent on:
1. Successful background and reference check
2. Proof of work authorization (I-9 verification)
3. Signed NDA and IP assignment agreement

Please sign and return this offer by March 15, 2025.

Sincerely,
Jennifer Walsh
VP of Human Resources
NovaTech AI Inc.
jennifer.walsh@novatech.ai | (650) 555-1122
ground_truth_fields: {"candidate_name": "Marcus Thompson", "company_name": "NovaTech AI Inc.", "position_title": "Senior Machine Learning Engineer", "offer_date": "2025-03-05", "start_date": "2025-04-01", "salary": "$175,000/year", "employment_type": "Full-time", "work_location": "Remote (US-based)", "department": "AI Platform Engineering", "reporting_to": "Dr. Sarah Kim", "benefits": "Medical, Dental, Vision, 401k 5% match, 30 days PTO, $3000 L&D budget", "conditions": "Background check, I-9 verification, NDA", "deadline_to_accept": "2025-03-15"}
notes: Senior ML engineer offer — remote USA with equity

document_text:
PATIENT MEDICAL RECORD

Patient Name: Sandra Liu
Patient ID: HOSP-2025-33871
Date of Birth: September 14, 1978
Gender: Female
Blood Type: A+
Insurance: BlueCross BlueShield — Policy #BCB-8844221

Visit Date: February 20, 2025
Facility: Riverside General Hospital — Internal Medicine
Attending Physician: Dr. Kevin Osei, MD
Department: Internal Medicine

CHIEF COMPLAINT
Patient presents with persistent fatigue, night sweats, and unintentional weight loss of 8 lbs over 6 weeks.

DIAGNOSIS
1. Suspected Lymphoma — pending biopsy confirmation
2. Iron-deficiency anemia (secondary)

VITAL SIGNS
Blood Pressure: 118/74 mmHg | Heart Rate: 88 bpm | Temperature: 37.4°C | SpO2: 97%

LABORATORY RESULTS
CBC: WBC 14.2 (elevated) | Hgb 9.8 g/dL (low) | Platelets 420 (elevated)
Ferritin: 8 ng/mL (low) | LDH: 380 U/L (elevated)
CT Chest/Abdomen: Mediastinal lymphadenopathy noted

PRESCRIBED MEDICATIONS
1. Ferrous Sulfate 325mg — once daily with food
2. Folic Acid 1mg — once daily

PLAN
Refer to Oncology. Excisional lymph node biopsy scheduled for February 28, 2025.

FOLLOW-UP
March 7, 2025 — Oncology department

NOTES
Patient counseled on diagnosis uncertainty pending biopsy. Family support present.
